attributes.action: MORE YOUTH CLUBS AND CENTRES TO STOP YOUNG CRIME
attributes.additional_details:
More youth clubs and centres need to be established as young crime leaves a scar on the community which creates bad opinions and stereotypes of young people. People need to feel safe and young people need somewhere where they can enjoy social activities which will benefit them in life. There is currently a shortage of such places and the youth community needs more opportunities for better lives.

YOUNG PEOPLE NEED TO ENJOY LIFE.

IF YOU WORK WITH THEM, THEY WILL WORK WITH YOU.

HELP CREATE A BETTER COUNTRY AND SET A GOOD EXAMPLE.

SIGN TO CREATE A BETTER GENERATION FOR THE FUTURE.
